name: green-software-meter
description: Energy efficiency analysis for Python code using static analysis

commands.title: Green Software Meter: Analyze current file
Green Software Meter: Analyze workspace Python files
Green Software Meter: Refactor with AI (energy efficiency)

greenSoftwareMeter.pythonPath.description: Path to the Python interpreter used to run the analyzer.

greenSoftwareMeter.analyzerPath.description: Full path to main.py (Green Software Meter). Leave empty to use main.py in workspace root.

greenSoftwareMeter.runOnSave.description: Run analysis when a Python file is saved.

greenSoftwareMeter.realtimeAnalysis.description: Run energy analysis as you type (Grammarly-style).

greenSoftwareMeter.llmApiKey.description: API key for AI refactor (Groq or OpenAI compatible). Leave empty to disable.

greenSoftwareMeter.llmModel.description: Model for AI refactor (e.g. mixtral-8x7b-32768, llama-3.1-8b-instant).
